messages.title: My plan for Taunton Deane
messages.content: "Rebecca’s plan for Taunton Deane shows that she is in touch with the concerns of the local community."

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Eliminate the deficit, bring down our debt, competitive business taxes to create more jobs
All pupils studying the core subjects at GCSE, creating more excellent school places, raising the status of the teaching profession
Keep job taxes down, young people working or in training, 3 million new apprenticeships
Raise personal allowance to £12,500, 40p rate only on those earning over £50,000, delivering tax-free childcare
Reduce the benefit cap to £23,000 a year, benefits frozen for 2 years, the household system of welfare for EU migrants anywhere in Europe
Pass on your pension tax-free, protecting the triple lock, integrating health and social care to improve care in retirement

issues.economy: Eliminate the deficit, bring down our debt, competitive business taxes to create more jobs
issues.education: All pupils studying the core subjects at GCSE, creating more excellent school places, raising the status of the teaching profession
issues.health: integrating health and social care to improve care in retirement
issues.immigration: the household system of welfare for EU migrants anywhere in Europe
issues.socialWelfare: Reduce the benefit cap to £23,000 a year, benefits frozen for 2 years

quotes.text: Rebecca’s plan for Taunton Deane shows that she is in touch with the concerns of the local community.

images.caption: Rebecca Pow: Standing up for Taunton Deane

leaflet.additionalNotes: Strong Leadership. A Clear Economic Plan. A Better, More Secure Future.
